attributes.action: ensure professional civil engineers are among the experts to sit on the proposed independent Infrastructure Planning Commission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Planning White Paper, published by the Department for Communities & Local Government in May 2007, proposes that infrastructure projects deemed of national significance will be approved by an independent Infrastructure Planning Commission.

This body will consist of experts from a range of fields, but given that civil engineers design, construct, deliver and maintain all infrastructure, be it of minor or national significance, it is vital that the engineering perspective is represented.

As well as signing this petition, please make your view known to the Department for Communities and Local Government which is running a consultation until August 17 2007.
